tarotCards.name: Ace Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Delays, lack of motivation, weighed down

tarotCards.name: Two Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Fear of unknown, lack of planning

tarotCards.name: Three Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of foresight, delays, obstacles to long-term goals

tarotCards.name: Five Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Conflict avoidance, diversity, agreeing to disagree

tarotCards.name: Six Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Egotism, disrepute, lack of confidence, fall from grace

tarotCards.name: Eight Of Wands
tarotCards.upDescription: Speed, action, air travel, movement, swift change

tarotCards.name: Nine Of Wands
tarotCards.upDescription: Courage, persistence, test of faith, resilience

tarotCards.name: Ten Of Wands
tarotCards.upDescription: Burden, responsibility, hard work, stress, achievement
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Taking on too much, avoiding responsibility

tarotCards.name: Page Of Wands
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Setbacks to new ideas, pessimism, lack of direction

tarotCards.name: Knight Of Wands
tarotCards.upDescription: Energy, passion, lust, action, adventure, impulsiveness

tarotCards.name: Two Of Cups
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Break-up, imbalance in a relationship, lack of harmony

tarotCards.name: Three Of Cups
tarotCards.reversedDescription: An affair, “three’s a crowd”, stifled creativity

tarotCards.name: Six Of Cups
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Stuck in the past, naivety, unrealistic

tarotCards.name: Seven Of Cups
tarotCards.upDescription: Fantasy, illusion, wishful thinking, choices, imagination

tarotCards.name: Ten Of Cups
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Misalignment of values, broken home or marriage

tarotCards.name: Knight Of Cups
tarotCards.upDescription: Romance, charm, ‘Knight in shining armour’, imagination

tarotCards.name: Ace Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Raw power, victory, break-throughs, mental clarity

tarotCards.name: Two Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Indecision, choices, truce, stalemate, blocked emotions

tarotCards.name: Three Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Painful separation, sorrow heartbreak, grief, rejection

tarotCards.name: Five Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Conflict, tension, loss, defeat, win at all costs, betrayal

tarotCards.name: Six Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Regretful but necessary transition, rite of passage

tarotCards.name: Seven Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Betrayal, deception, getting away with something, stealth

tarotCards.name: Ten Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Back-stabbed, defeat, crisis, betrayal, endings, loss
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Recovery, regeneration, fear of ruin, inevitable end

tarotCards.name: Page Of Swords
tarotCards.reversedDescription: All talk and no action, haste, undelivered promises

tarotCards.name: King Of Swords
tarotCards.upDescription: Clear thinking, intellectual power, authority, truth

tarotCards.name: Ace Of Pentacles
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight

tarotCards.name: Three Of Pentacles
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of teamwork, disregard for skills

tarotCards.name: Five Of Pentacles
tarotCards.upDescription: Isolation, insecurity, worry, financial loss, poverty
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty

tarotCards.name: Six Of Pentacles
tarotCards.upDescription: Generosity, charity, giving, prosperity, sharing wealth

tarotCards.name: Seven Of Pentacles
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward

tarotCards.name: Page Of Pentacles
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of progress and planning, short-term focus

tarotCards.name: The Fool
tarotCards.upDescription: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit

tarotCards.name: The High Priestess
tarotCards.upDescription: Intuition, Higher powers, mystery, subconscious mind
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Hidden agendas, need to listen to inner voice

tarotCards.name: The Hierophant
tarotCards.upDescription: Religion, group identification, conformity, tradition, beliefs

tarotCards.name: The Lovers
tarotCards.upDescription: Love, union, relationships, values alignment, choices

tarotCards.name: The Chariot
tarotCards.upDescription: Control, will power, victory, assertion, determination
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of control and direction, aggression

tarotCards.name: Justice
tarotCards.upDescription: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law

tarotCards.name: The Hermit
tarotCards.upDescription: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance

tarotCards.name: Wheel Of Fortune
tarotCards.upDescription: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Bad luck, negative external forces, out of control

tarotCards.name: Death
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Resistance to change, unable to move on

tarotCards.name: Temperance
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Imbalance, excess, lack of long-term vision

tarotCards.name: The Tower
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Avoidance of disaster, fear of change

tarotCards.name: The World
tarotCards.reversedDescription: Lack of completion, lack of closure
